"SkyWagon" - A flying car that uses solar panels for energy and has a retractable roof for easy access to the sky. It would have a sleek and modern design, with the ability to take off and land vertically or horizontally. The SkyWagon would be perfect for those who love the thrill of flying and the convenience of driving.

"HyperLoop" - A high-speed transportation system that uses magnetic levitation technology to propel vehicles through a vacuum-sealed tube. It would be able to reach speeds of up to 700 miles per hour, making it perfect for long-distance travel. The HyperLoop would be environmentally friendly, as it would produce no emissions.

"Underground Express" - A transportation system that uses magnetic levitation technology to propel vehicles through underground tunnels. It would be able to bypass traffic congestion and provide a faster and more efficient way to travel. The Underground Express would be perfect for those who want to avoid the crowds and the pollution.

"WaterCraft" - A transportation system that uses hydrogen fuel cells to power electric motors, allowing vehicles to travel on water. It would be able to reach speeds of up to 30 miles per hour and would be perfect for those who love the water and the environment.

"Magnetic Skytrain" - A high-speed transportation system that uses magnetic levitation technology to propel vehicles through the air. It would be able to bypass traffic congestion and provide a faster and more efficient way to travel. The Magnetic Skytrain would be perfect for those who want to avoid the crowds and the pollution, and would be able to reach speeds of up to 500 miles per hour.
